title: You have disconnected, check your internet connection and try again...
body:
Why does this error message show every time I try to connect to the game? look at this crap http://matchhistory.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/#match-details/OC1/76482284/200984220?tab=overview
my team had to go 3 vs 5 because me (draven) and nidalee (apparently) had the same problem. I asked a friend to spectate *using the freaking LoL client* and we could have won if this stupid bug wasn't there to ruin it. 

Not only that, I could be sent to the low priority queue or some suspension because of the game's own fault. **This bug has been around for a really long time and riot is just ignoring it**.

My internet is fine, and I did absolutely everything I could for the game to work. I even did what you're thinking of telling me that I should have done. I did that, too. 

This game is riddled with game breaking bugs. One gets fixed, two more come out. I know that its practically impossible for a big game like LoL to be bug free but having a bug like this being around for *litterally years* is not good.

I will now probably be waiting 20 minutes in low priority queue for a game to start. Thanks, riot. {{item:3070}}  {{item:2044}}

replies.body: i have had same issue in client. i have had friends with same problem and saw oddone have same problem on this stream.
Maybe Riot just enjoy drinking the tears of lost hopes and dreams?
